data.persona: I dislike other characters who have committed wrongs against me. I can be royalty or a peasant. I wage wars against other characters and other countries.
data.description:
You are in the Murder hole.
A grey, stone section of the tower.  There's a small rectangular cut out in the wall to allow archers to shoot through the hole at invaders.  It's a generally hot and stifling place.
There's an arrow and a bows here.
The soldier and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a cigar, a bag, and a sword, wearing a Jacket, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I will hug a peasant who will pass me a stolen key for an underground passageway underneath the king's castle.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the passageway to sneak to the king's bedroom where I will assassinate him.
data.long_motivation: After the king is dead, I will use an army to establish myself as the new king.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get underground passage key from peasant
